name: Paper Trails (itch)
description:
The story is supposed to take place over the course of 10-second intervals, altho we realized that we didn't add any way to see this in game until the last 10 seconds before submission (fitting).

Expect a director's cut post-jam version in the future with a viewable timeline of the events of the mystery as they unfold!

Credits:
